s1.ptxt: Warm up engine to normal operating temperature.
Turn A/C switch OFF, if equipped.
Turn steering wheel fully and check idle speed.
Engine idle speed drops a little momentarily when steering wheel is turned fully but returns to its specified level immediately.
If power steering pressure switch connector is connected, check the same with that connector disconnected.
Momentary drop of engine idle speed should be less when it is connected than when disconnected.
